languages.text: "Уверен, защитники судна были бы в меньшем ужасе от появления крейсера на авгурах, чем от вашего присутствия".

traits.locale_text: "Уверен, защитники судна были бы в меньшем ужасе от появления крейсера на авгурах, чем от вашего присутствия".

languages.text: "I'll wager the ship's defenders would be less terrified to see a cruiser appear on their augurs than to watch you charge at them across the deck."
languages.original_text: "Уверен, защитники судна были бы в меньшем ужасе от появления крейсера на авгурах, чем от вашего присутствия".

traits.locale_text: "I'll wager the ship's defenders would be less terrified to see a cruiser appear on their augurs than to watch you charge at them across the deck."
"I'll wager the ship's defenders would be less terrified to see a cruiser appear on their augurs than to watch you charge at them across the deck."

"I'll wager the ship's defenders would be less terrified to see a cruiser appear on their augurs than to watch you charge at them across the deck."
"I'll wager the ship's defenders would be less terrified to see a cruiser appear on their augurs than to watch you charge at them across the deck."

languages.text: 「賭けてもいいですが、あの船の守備兵どもは、艦載オーガーに巡洋艦が映るのを見るより、あなたがデッキを突進してくる姿を見るほうがよほど恐ろしいと思っているでしょう」
languages.original_text: "I'll wager the ship's defenders would be less terrified to see a cruiser appear on their augurs than to watch you charge at them across the deck."

traits.locale_text: 「賭けてもいいですが、あの船の守備兵どもは、艦載オーガーに巡洋艦が映るのを見るより、あなたがデッキを突進してくる姿を見るほうがよほど恐ろしいと思っているでしょう」

languages.text: "Es würde den Verteidigern des Schiffs wohl weniger Angst machen, einen Kreuzer auf ihren Auguren zu entdecken, als Euch über ihr Deck stürmen zu sehen."
languages.original_text: "I'll wager the ship's defenders would be less terrified to see a cruiser appear on their augurs than to watch you charge at them across the deck."

traits.locale_text: "Es würde den Verteidigern des Schiffs wohl weniger Angst machen, einen Kreuzer auf ihren Auguren zu entdecken, als Euch über ihr Deck stürmen zu sehen."

languages.text: « Quelque chose me dit que les défenseurs du vaisseau seraient moins terrifiés par l'apparition d'un croiseur sur leurs augures qu'en vous voyant les charger sur le pont. »
languages.original_text: "I'll wager the ship's defenders would be less terrified to see a cruiser appear on their augurs than to watch you charge at them across the deck."

traits.locale_text: « Quelque chose me dit que les défenseurs du vaisseau seraient moins terrifiés par l'apparition d'un croiseur sur leurs augures qu'en vous voyant les charger sur le pont. »

languages.text: «Apuesto a que los defensores de la nave estarían menos aterrorizados detectando un crucero en sus augures que viéndolo cargar hacia ellos».
languages.original_text: "I'll wager the ship's defenders would be less terrified to see a cruiser appear on their augurs than to watch you charge at them across the deck."

traits.locale_text: «Apuesto a que los defensores de la nave estarían menos aterrorizados detectando un crucero en sus augures que viéndolo cargar hacia ellos».

languages.text: “我敢打赌，这艘船上的敌人宁愿在俄歇矩阵上看到一艘巡洋舰，也不愿在甲板上看到你朝他们冲过去。”
languages.original_text: "I'll wager the ship's defenders would be less terrified to see a cruiser appear on their augurs than to watch you charge at them across the deck."

traits.locale_text: “我敢打赌，这艘船上的敌人宁愿在俄歇矩阵上看到一艘巡洋舰，也不愿在甲板上看到你朝他们冲过去。”

languages.text: "Her iddiasına girerim ki gemiyi savunanlar, güvertede seni görseler alametlerinde bir kruvazör görmüş olmayı dilerdi."
languages.original_text: "I'll wager the ship's defenders would be less terrified to see a cruiser appear on their augurs than to watch you charge at them across the deck."
